doc:
Spike Spencer https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Spike_Spencer 0 Charles Forrest "Spike" Spencer (born December 21, 1968) is an American voice actor and columnist best known for dubbing Japanese anime films. He is known for his roles in ADV Films dubs of Neon Genesis Evangelion as Shinji Ikari, Martian Successor Nadesico as Akito Tenkawa, and Excel Saga as Gojo Shioji. He has also performed voice acting for radio, especially commercials. His anime character voices tend to be either for timid, shy, or weak characters, or for eccentric and comical ones. Charles_Forrest_"_Spike_"_Spencer ( born December_21_,_1968 ) is an_American_voice_actor_and_columnist best_known for dubbing Japanese_anime_films . He is_known for his_roles in ADV_Films_dubs of Neon_Genesis_Evangelion as Shinji_Ikari , Martian_Successor_Nadesico as Akito_Tenkawa , and Excel_Saga as Gojo_Shioji . He has_also_performed voice acting for radio , especially commercials . His_anime_character_voices tend_to_be_either for timid_,_shy_,_or_weak_characters , or for eccentric_and_comical_ones .
